fields.name: Cause Distraction (Charge 90%):
fields.value: All of your target's visits tonight will be astral and immune to roleblock.

fields.name: Craft Mask (1x, Charge 60%):
fields.value: Grant your target a disguise. The next time they are targeted by an investigative ability, it will show a favorable (Town-aligned, no attack power, and no visits) or otherwise incorrect result.

fields.name: Set The Stage (2x, Locked):
fields.value: Unlocked when you place in the top half twice. The next time your target is targeted by an investigative ability, it will show an unfavorable (e.g. Mafia-aligned, high attack power, and mimicking one of the mafia member's visits that night) or otherwise incorrect result.

fields.name: Encore (Locked):
fields.value: Unlocked when you place in the top 3. You may multi-task your abilities, but not self-target when doing so (using the Desperation passive does not trigger this disability).
